title: G7 agree to 'starve the Russian war machine'
description: Leaders of the G7 countries gather in Japan, amid a focus on Ukraine and tensions with China.

title: Why G7 has eight more seats at the table this year
description: The BBC unpacks the guest list for this year's summit - who is on it, who is missing and why?

title: Outcry as Australian police Taser 95-year-old woman
description: Care home resident Clare Nowland is not expected to survive the incident, a family friend says.

title: Iran executes three over anti-government protests
description: Amnesty says the men were killed in "a blatant act of vengeance" and without a fair trial.

title: Leopard attacks spark fear in Indian villages
description: For years, residents of Bijnor have peacefully coexisted with leopards. Now they say they are afraid.

title: How a Bollywood actress was framed as a drug mule
description: Chrisann Pereira flew to Sharjah for an audition, but landed straight into a nightmare.

title: Al-Qaeda free Australian hostage after 7 years
description: Dr Ken Elliott, 88, and his wife were captured in Burkina Faso in 2016.

title: How Ukraine is tackling the mental scars of war
description: The psychological effects of Russia's invasion are starting to show in Ukraine, at the front and at home.

title: Cyclone Mocha death toll rises sharply in Myanmar
description: At least 145 people are now known to have been killed by the storm, Myanmar's military rulers say.

title: China overtakes Japan as world's top car exporter
description: The jump in China's exports was boosted by rising demand for electric vehicles and sales to Russia.

title: China overtakes Japan as world's top car exporter

title: Agency refuses to hand over Harry and Meghan photos
description: Backgrid says the couple demanded photos taken of them during a paparazzi pursuit through New York.

title: Smiths bassist Andy Rourke dies aged 59
description: Guitarist Johnny Marr confirmed Rourke died after a lengthy illness with pancreatic cancer.

title: Watch: Emotional Harrison Ford accepts Cannes award
description: The acting legend was in Cannes ahead of the premiere for the fifth instalment of Indiana Jones.

title: West Ham players confront fan attack on family area
description: AZ Alkmaar fans attacked an area in which friends and family were watching the match.
